title: Person of Interest: Shaw and Bear
author: The69Observer
comment: It's weird how much of a sociopathic anomaly Shaw is. She can't feel very many emotions, or form attachments, but she loves animals and gets all happy around Bear
Shaw's character development made me cry the most during the shows run.
So sad, this didn't run for 27 seasons.

Too funny......
At the end of the day ( Of all the guys ) Shaw takes Bear home lol.....
Bear ROCKS
"Cow femur" and "Dinosaur bone" cracks me up all the time :'D
description:
It's a story of Dog meets Girl. It is no secret Shaw has a crush on our favorite dog. Will she be able to spend some alone time with the dog ? Will she always be second on the dog's affection to Reese ?

Let's form a group of shippers, I say let's call our selves ShawBear, sounds nice.

I do not own the rights, just watch this superb show.
